item.title: Apple Crisp For 200
item.description: Kids and adults love apple crisp for dessert. So easy to make and goes with any meal. Schools, camps, and churches love this recipe. Apple Crisp for 200 People Apple Ingredients 8 #10 cans sliced apples (water pack) 16 c. sugar 16 tbs corn starch 8 tbs cinnamon 8- 2â€³ full size hotel pans Apple Directions place 1 can apples, (do not drain) in each pan and even out.
